CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Total Energy Generated stage positioned above or below the Billed Consumption stage?
SRP.A: The Total Energy Generated stage is positioned {above} the Billed Consumption stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Paid Consumption?
VE.A: The value of stage Paid Consumption is {10800}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Delivered to End Users?
VE.A: The value of stage Delivered to End Users is {30420}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-Transmission?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-Transmission is {52549}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Total Energy Generated, with a value of {73791}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Paid Consumption, with a value of {10800}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Delivered to End Users to stage Billed Consumption?
SC.A: Decreased by {10485} Megawatt Hours from stage Delivered to End Users to stage Billed Consumption.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Post-Generation to stage Post-Transmission?
SC.A: Decreased by {9677} Megawatt Hours from stage Post-Generation to stage Post-Transmission.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Total Energy Generated to stage Post-Generation?
SC.A: Decreased by {11565} Megawatt Hours from stage Total Energy Generated to stage Post-Generation.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 57387? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Total Energy Generated} stage has {73791}, the {Post-Generation} stage has {62226}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 25177? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Billed Consumption} stage has {19935}, the {Paid Consumption} stage has {10800}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 25177 and 57387? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Post-Transmission} stage has {52549}, the {Post-Distribution} stage has {41978}, the {Delivered to End Users} stage has {30420}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Post-Generation to Post-Transmission, or from stage Total Energy Generated to Post-Generation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Total Energy Generated} to {Post-Generation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Post-Transmission to Post-Distribution, from stage Post-Distribution to Delivered to End Users, or from stage Billed Consumption to Paid Consumption?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Distribution} to stage {Delivered to End Users} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Total Energy Generated} and {Post-Generation} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Billed Consumption} and {Paid Consumption} stages.
